title: Drawing, "Sketch. Peak of a mountain in the Andes, Ecuador.  The Cayambe (?)", August or September 1853
medium: Graphite, burch and ozicized white gouache on gray paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with the figure: 2; again at top: Otabalo; and at bottom: Remember the ashy lights.  The black rocks and brown grass 2
description: Horizontal rectangle showing the peak of a mountain.  Range extends toward the left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch. Peak of a mountain in the Andes, Ecuador.  The Cayambe (?)", August or September 1853.
August or September 1853. Graphite, burch and ozicized white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-125.
